alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Lincoln; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 8:07PM CDT until April 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN...NORTHEASTERN ELLSWORTH AND SALINE COUNTIES... At 806 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tescott to near Kanopolis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 to 70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Salina, Assaria, Brookville, Smolan, Beverly, New Cambria, Falun, Glendale, Westfall and Salina Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
